title: Admissions
intro: Admissions are open for Nursery to High School. We welcome parents to join our nurturing and value-based learning environment.

process.title: Enquiry
process.description: Parents can contact the school or visit the campus to enquire about admissions.

process.title: Application
process.description: Fill out the admission application form and submit required documents.

process.title: Interaction
process.description: Student interaction or assessment as applicable for the grade.

process.title: Confirmation
process.description: Admission confirmation upon successful completion of the process.

eligibility: Nursery to High School admissions available
Age criteria as per government guidelines
Transfer Certificate required for higher grades

cta.title: Admissions Open
